name: SaphiRose Women's Long Hooded Rain Jacket Outdoor Raincoat Windbreaker
short_description: 【Size Recommend】: This raincoat has a relaxed fit which runs large. If you're not layering more, or prefer a slimmer fit, consider one size down. Model in picture is 5'9" (174 cm), 114.64 lbs (52kg), size small fits well. Note that size measurements refer to jacket itself, not body measurements.
【Material】: This rain jacket made of 100% polyester shell which is water-resistant, suits for traveling or walking in light rain. Soft lining make sure comfortable enough to wear.

【Special Design】: Saphirose jackets adjustable design with waist & hood drawstring, by tightening or loosening waist drawstring, helping it better fit different body shapes; Sturdy zipper and storm flap with snaps ensure long-lasting; Two snap pockets provide safe storage.

【Features】: It's a hip-length jacket with lined sleeves, weighs about 2lb(910g), which's a little heavy for those who like to keep it light. Feature bound seams inside, eliminating excess threads and preventing discomfort. You can hand wash or machine wash by low temperature, dry clean recommended.

【Occasions】: This coat is versatile, suitable for various activities such as daily wear, camping, hiking, biking, climbing, picnicking, walking, traveling, dog-walking, watching ball games, and other outdoor sports and activities.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H ‎15.2 x 11.69 x 1.93 inches

name: LAMA Womens Long Raincoats Rain Jacket Waterproof Packable Hooded Windbreaker Lightweight Adjustable Waist for Outdoor
product_description: LAMA Women's Hooded Waterproof Jacket Product description: - Closure type: Zip up with 2 large pockets - Sleeves: Long sleeves with adjustable drawstring. - Length: Knee length with adjustable elastic waist. - With hood: prevents rain from blowing on eyes and face. - Material: polyester, spandex, 100% waterproof material Features: - Breathable, soft and comfortable, skin-friendly, quick-drying. - Waterproof jackets for all seasons, perfect knee length that covers the hips up to the calves for a slimmer look. - Releasing your hands, with this long waterproof raincoat, you don't even need to carry an umbrella on rainy days. - Only 0.3kg, the women's long raincoats can be packed in a bag, easy to carry in your backpack in case of unpredictable rainy days. - Occasions: Perfect for daily casual, outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, running, traveling, fishing and cycling. - Care instructions: hand wash or machine wash in cold water, hang dry. Do not bleach to protect the properties of the waterproof material. NOTE: In the image and product description attached our garment size chart which are raincoat size measurements. Please check the size chart carefully before purchasing.
